Takle共同发行了这首演唱版。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658221696&idx=1&sn=d7f330591f5eb666ea040d4701a09a5a&chksm=f7905b96c0e7d280d40befab09397d5ec08804879b2adf2cd1c46cf25ce0f7e91aade7dacf99&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl64Emeq70SIJxVSo8TNfkAlLv2JxNuym2TxVuTQlVO2vyQNLY2H88TNBpNIu6ibrqEZ9MQRU1MMliaw/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","subtype":9,"is_multi":1,"multi_app_msg_item_list":[{"title":"重温经典《追梦人》梦想本不会发光，发光的是追梦的你","digest":"歌曲《追梦人》创作于1991年台湾女作家三毛去世之后。《追梦人》本是1991年罗大佑纪念三毛离世创作，特别邀请凤飞飞来演唱的。当时热播电视剧《雪山飞狐》片尾曲而走红。

《追梦人》的前身是罗大佑为电影《天若有情》创作的主题曲《天若有情》的国语版歌曲，之后，作为纪念作家三毛的歌曲，罗大佑对原《青春无悔》增加了四句歌词，而且歌名也不一样。改换歌名，重编重唱，以这首《追梦人》为名的歌曲形象示人，这在罗大佑以往的作品中是绝无仅有的。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658221696&idx=2&sn=7b245c3dd9af4398faf905c4460704b8&chksm=f7905b96c0e7d28058425c8cac30c837b3765cc5ba0a884ab88f84fa6ba67f609b3576245fd7&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl64Emeq70SIJxVSo8TNfkAlBjwjJAt9gMG7OibcntNQaDK1Ms0CbOFO26NqdrMX5orSrIwTJpic0jBQ/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"【轻音乐U盘】2000首高品质精选轻音乐合集","digest":"感谢大家支持","content":"","fileid":510738042,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658221696&idx=3&sn=b4f984ddda6e95d2f45bbb94c6ea1d86&chksm=f7905b96c0e7d28032cca1ce4617a4bd15fabc520a9054df2fff5f888c59dfd29cab63c6d93f&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"https://mmbizurl.cn/s/oXJtERVey","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl6g2p3A2eaTjr9RDr3dSOcicLS887A4ibPqMtFfObTfydTltOpqaHiboibdnkRu0Zmfkp0AWuytOFqrZg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":0,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"人，不能太闲
